direct_enhancements.method_name: sendSignedRequest(String, String, Map<String, Object>, HttpMethod, boolean)
direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve sending signed requests with similar parameters and control flows.
Both methods query historical records related to rebates but with different endpoints.
Both methods require signature generation for secure API requests.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require initialization of the RequestHandler with necessary dependencies.
Setting up the proxy is required before sending any API requests.
Both methods need to verify the API response format and handle potential exceptions.
